attributes.action: Debate a Motion of No Confidence in Theresa May as Prime Minister.
attributes.background: Both remain & leave voting citizens have no confidence that Theresa May can successfully deliver a satisfactory outcome to the current crisis facing the country over Brexit.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. That includes motions of no confidence.

If you would like another general election, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
